name: Sushi Platter Deluxe
description: A colorful assortment of fresh sushi rolls with salmon, tuna, and avocado.

name: Cheesy Nachos Supreme
description: Crispy nachos loaded with melted cheese, jalapenos, and salsa.

name: Ramen Bowl Special
description: Japanese-style ramen noodles with soft-boiled egg, pork, and miso broth.

name: Shawarma Wrap
description: Tender chicken wrapped in pita bread with garlic sauce and fresh veggies.

name: Falafel Platter
description: Crispy falafel served with hummus, pita bread, and salad.

name: Loaded Fries
description: Golden fries topped with cheese, crispy bacon, and ranch dressing.

name: Thai Green Curry
description: Spicy Thai curry with coconut milk, chicken, and green chili paste.

name: Dim Sum Basket
description: Assorted steamed dumplings filled with shrimp, pork, and vegetables.

name: Mediterranean Platter
description: A mix of hummus, tabbouleh, olives, pita, and grilled meat skewers.

name: Taco Trio
description: Three Mexican-style tacos filled with beef, chicken, and veggies.
